TopicTitle: Lil Rover (Super Stable) by Zokesia Skunkworks!

Articles.Content:
I made this cute rover!

It uses an SAS pod to stay very stable, so much that it's difficult to even turn with it on! Great for long runs, especially Duna. I drove it 50km both ways to save a stranded crew, never had to reload the save (except when i pressed the wrong button). It's noob proof!

Designed as a Subassemby to make it easy to place on any ship. Put it in your Subassemblies folder instead of the normal one.

Uses two solar panels, one which is retractable. While it can stay out on Duna without breaking, it's best to leave it in while cruising.

So far I've tested it on Duna, Kerbin, Dres, and Eve, passes tests with flying colors. Also has full science array, as well as landing legs to allow emergency stops.

http://www./?7b0ezi9ef86d7rk
I believe it's time for another race but with a twist.
